content.body: The due date for the April plenary’s notes is soon. WHATWG Observables’ item still has no Speaker's Summary of Key Points or Conclusion. Would it be appropriate for me to fill them in, even though I was not the speaker (DMF)?
Ditto for Immutable ArrayBuffer, Don’t Remember Panicking, Compare Strings by Codepoint [started but incomplete], and `export defer`.
content.formatted_body: Ditto for Immutable ArrayBuffer, Don’t Remember Panicking, Compare Strings by Codepoint [started but incomplete], and export defer.

content.body: better to fill in your best guess than to have nothing, i'd say
